function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incremental rise in research on antimicrobial graphene compounds","Impact":"Increase in unverified or unregulated antimicrobial products","Mitigation":"Regulation and oversight on the use of graphene-based antimicrobial products","Technologies":"Regulatory frameworks, quality control measures","People":"Consumers, workers, general public","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, industry standards organizations"},{"Description":"Use of graphene oxide (GO) as an effective virucide","Impact":"Potential resistance to GO and reduced effectiveness over time","Mitigation":"Research into alternative antimicrobial compounds, rotation of antimicrobial agents","Technologies":"Antimicrobial resistance research, development of alternative virucides","People":"Medical professionals, researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Development of air filtration systems with graphene for virus killing","Impact":"Inadequate testing and verification of virus-killing efficacy","Mitigation":"Stringent testing and certification of graphene-based air filtration systems","Technologies":"Virus testing chambers, standardized test protocols","People":"Commercial property owners, employees, building occupants","Owner":"Safety and health regulatory bodies, property management organizations"}]}
